titles.title: To amend chapter 89 of title 5, United States Code, to modify the formula under which the Government contribution for a Federal employee or annuitant enrolled in a health benefits plan under such chapter is determined.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 6/10/1997--Introduced. Amends Federal law concerning Government organization and employees to repeal specified requirements relating to Government contributions for health benefits for a Federal employee or annuitant enrolled in a health benefits plan. Replaces them with provisions to modify the formula under which the Government contribution for such an employee or annuitant is determined.
